ol.li: In the Auto Lib View Generation form, select Mode – GDS/CDL.
Select Run type – Input file. The Cell file field is now editable, while the Lib field is not.
Select the file chooser on the right of the Cell file field to open a UNIX Browser (Figure 10).

Click Choose.
UNIX browser for Cell file field
The Auto Lib View Generation form should look like Figure 11: Auto Lib View Generation form in GDS/CDL mode

Click Apply.
The default Run directory name is ./autoLib; you can change the name, as desired.
Several messages are displayed in the CIW output pane. The entire operation is complete when the final message "Total time taken" displays (Figure 12). CIW output messages
The structure of Run directory autoLib is shown in Figure 13. The individual directories that are also cell names contain the cell-level gds and cdl files. These cell level files are combined for the library level in the ldk_demo_lib.gds and ldk_demo_lib.cdl file when the option Copy to delivery dir is enabled. Run dir autoLib directory structure
